trans-unit.source: This section specifies withholding tax data.

seg-source.mrk: This section specifies withholding tax data.

target.mrk: 本區段會指定扣繳稅資料。

trans-unit.source: The withholding tax is a form of taxation deducted at the beginning of the payment flow.

seg-source.mrk: The withholding tax is a form of taxation deducted at the beginning of the payment flow.

target.mrk: 扣繳稅是付款流量初始時的課稅扣除形式。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the system configuration for the corresponding company code, the withholding tax fields are available. The <cite>Withholding Tax</cite> section contains several fields, for example:

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the system configuration for the corresponding company code, the withholding tax fields are available.
The <cite>Withholding Tax</cite> section contains several fields, for example:

target.mrk: 根據對應公司代碼的系統組態，系統會提供扣繳稅欄位。
<cite>扣繳稅</cite> 區段包含數個欄位，例如：

trans-unit.source: The <cite>Withholding Tax Code</cite> is a tax category, which must be taken into account in tax reporting to financial authorities.

seg-source.mrk: The <cite>Withholding Tax Code</cite> is a tax category, which must be taken into account in tax reporting to financial authorities.

target.mrk: 在給財政主管機關的稅務報表製作中，<cite>扣繳稅代碼</cite> 是一種需列入考慮的稅別。

trans-unit.source: The <cite>Withholding Tax Amount in the Local Currency</cite> displays the amount in the currency of the company code.

seg-source.mrk: The <cite>Withholding Tax Amount in the Local Currency</cite> displays the amount in the currency of the company code.

target.mrk: <cite>扣繳稅額 (本國貨幣)</cite> 會顯示金額 (公司代碼貨幣)。

trans-unit.source: Using the <uicontrol>Settings</uicontrol> icon, you can display further fields.

seg-source.mrk: Using the <uicontrol>Settings</uicontrol> icon, you can display further fields.

target.mrk: 您可以使用 <uicontrol>[設定]</uicontrol> 圖示來顯示進階欄位。
